room_title: Escape room "Camp Echo" by Escape Goat in Orlando
review: We had such a great time at Escape Goat! Definitely a unique and super fun experience! The staff was amazing and you have to try "Camp Echo" Echo echo echo!! The rooms are designed for beginners and enthusiasts!

room_title: Escape room "Camp Echo" by Escape Goat in Orlando
review: Camp Echo is a fantastic experience!! Escape Goat has such an inviting atmosphere, you feel like you are part of the family when you walk in! I would recommend this place to anyone!!

room_title: Escape room "Camp Echo" by Escape Goat in Orlando
review: We're enthusiasts from Ohio. Stopped here while visiting family and got them hooked! The Escape Goat is the real deal. If we ever fulfill our dream of running our own place, this is how we'd do it. Awesome puzzles, even for all skill levels and ages. Our kids loved the Camp Echo room. The quality of these rooms is amazing - not your thrift store props and concrete floors like most! The in-room actors were great! These owners are the best! Can't wait to stop in for new rooms the next time we're in town.

room_title: Escape room "Camp Echo" by Escape Goat in Orlando
review: So fun! We played Camp Echo and this is one of the best games we played in Orlando... the staff made it totally worth it! Will definitely come by again.

room_title: Escape room "Camp Echo" by Escape Goat in Orlando
review: I can't say enough about this place! I brought my wife with some friends for her birthday and we had a blast!! Camp Echo is a very unique room experience complete with a Camp Counselor who is there just in case you need clues as well as to keep the story flowing. We can't wait to go back and try "Area 51". If you are looking for something fun to do, try Escape Goat, you'll love it too.
